info.senderName: NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued May 17 at 4:10PM MDT until May 17 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.description:
The National Weather Service in El Paso has issued a
* Dust Advisory for... Southwestern Otero County in south central New Mexico... Southern Dona Ana County in south central New Mexico... El Paso County in western Texas...
* Until 615 PM MDT.
* At 409 PM MDT, an area of blowing dust was moving over West El Paso.
HAZARD...Less than one mile visibility with strong winds around 35 mph.
SOURCE...Satellite imagery.
IMPACT...Hazardous travel.
* This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in New Mexico between mile markers 153 and 164. Interstate 10 in Texas between mile markers 1 and 43. Highway 54 in New Mexico between mile markers 1 and 21.
Locations impacted include... West El Paso, East El Paso, Central El Paso, Northeast El Paso, Far East El Paso, Mission Valley, Chaparral, Horizon City, Clint, Santa Teresa, Anthony, Vado, Sunland Park, Canutillo, Afton, Anthony Gap, Berino, San Elizario, Vinton, and San Miguel.
info.instruction: Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.

area.areaDesc: Dona Ana, NM; Otero, NM; El Paso, TX
